long_description: Going across town or across the sea? Pack the women's Essential Stripe Dress from Royal Robbins. The wrinkle-resistant, fast-drying dress feels super comfy and offers flattering style. Blended fabric offers UPF 50+ sun protection and easy-going 2-way stretch. Styling includes striped front panels sewn on the bias with an offset front seam that creates a flattering chevron effect. Essential Stripe Dress from Royal Robbins features a front yoke with horizontal stripes and an eye-catching knot detail.
short_description: Going across town or across the sea? Pack the women's Essential Stripe Dress from Royal Robbins. The wrinkle-resistant, fast-drying dress feels super comfy and offers flattering style.
